abstract: The drama between blogger Michael Arrington and his former business partner, Fusion Garage, has heated up: Fusion Garage announces Monday it will sell the CrunchPad tablet PC on its own under the name Joojoo.
snippet: The drama between blogger Michael Arrington and his former business partner, Fusion Garage, has heated up: Fusion Garage announces Monday it will sell the CrunchPad tablet PC on its own under the name Joojoo.
lead_paragraph: Update | 3:32 p.m. Added comments from Michael Arrington.

headline.main: The CrunchPad Is Resurrected as the Joojoo
